welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ecully, a charming city known for its historic architecture and delicious French cuisine. We are excited to have you here and invite you to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bron Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bron Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boutheon Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Boutheon Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
